statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, start_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, completion_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, completion_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE status = 'Completed' AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, completion_date, status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE completion_date IS NULL AND status != 'Cancelled' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, end_date, completion_status FROM experimental_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, completion_status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, end_date, completion_status FROM experimental_tasks ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT task_name AS name, end_date AS due_date, completion_status AS status FROM experimental_tasks WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date FROM experimental_tasks ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
SELECT task_name, success_rate FROM experimental_tasks JOIN experiment_results ON experimental_tasks.task_id = experiment_results.task_id WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalTasks;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM ExperimentalTasks WHERE progress_status = 'Not Started';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM ExperimentalTasks ORDER BY assigned_to DESC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM ExperimentalTasks WHERE due_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT task_name, progress_status FROM ExperimentalTasks WHERE assigned_to IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM ExperimentalTasks WHERE progress_status = 'Not Started';
SELECT task_name, due_date, progress_status FROM ExperimentalTasks WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ExperimentalTasks.task_name, ExperimentResults.result_data FROM ExperimentalTasks INNER JOIN ExperimentResults ON ExperimentalTasks.task_id = ExperimentResults.task_id;
SELECT comment, commenter_name FROM TaskComments WHERE task_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_tasks;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT task_name, description FROM experimental_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email, assignee_role FROM task_assignees WHERE task_id=1;
SELECT task_name, progress, date_completed FROM experimental_tasks JOIN task_progress ON experimental_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id;
SELECT task_name, description FROM experimental_tasks;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_tasks WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email, assignee_role FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM experimental_tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT progress, date_completed, notes FROM task_progress WHERE progress LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT * FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tasks WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT experiment_name, experimenter_name FROM Experiments JOIN Experimenters ON Experiments.experimenter_id = Experimenters.experimenter_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description, start_date, end_date FROM Tasks WHERE start_date <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM Task_Logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, start_date, end_date FROM Tasks;
SELECT experimenter_name, experimenter_email FROM Experimenters;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM Experiments WHERE status='completed';
SELECT task_name, experiment_name, task_duration FROM Tasks_Experiments;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM Task_Logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
